name: AfroBull Style LoRA
description:
This is my second style LoRA and it's for another of my favorite art styles and artist, Afrobull.

This LoRA was trained on 675 sfw and nsfw images. All examples images were generated on Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix using AnythingV3 VAE.

I recommended using the LoRA at around 0.5-0.7 weight for best results.

LoRAs and Embeds Used: Matoi Ryuuko - Toga Himiko - Yoko Littner - Bad Prompts - Bad Hands (Unstable Discord)
